BorderDefault Palette Config Module #

A default palette of border colors with properties/values with the keys of default, error, primary, secondary, and success.

Import #

To import the compiled library version of the BorderDefault Palette Config Module:

import { BorderDefault } from '@obewds/vueventus'
1

To import the BorderDefault Palette Config Module directly:

import BorderDefault from '@obewds/vueventus/dist/configs/palettes/BorderDefault.js'
1

Use #

const borderDefault = BorderDefault.default
const borderError = BorderDefault.error
const borderPrimary = BorderDefault.primary
const borderSecondary = BorderDefault.secondary
const borderSuccess = BorderDefault.success
1
2
3
4
5

Module #

// ./src/configs/palettes/BorderDefault.ts

import { DefaultConfigPalette } from '../../types/DefaultConfigPalette'

export default <DefaultConfigPalette>{
    '': '',
    'default': 'border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-600',
    error: 'border-rose-600 dark:border-rose-300',
    primary: 'border-blue-600 dark:border-blue-300',
    secondary: 'border-violet-600 dark:border-violet-300',
    success: 'border-green-600 dark:border-green-300',
}
